channel.title: My Breakout Game In Development
channel.description:
Hey everybody. I just wanted to show a little game that I'm makeing. Its not finished yet I just started on it today. Here are some pictures of what I have so far though:
Old Title Screen [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/mm.jpg[/img]
New Title Screen (Updated Febuary 4, 2011) [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/nts.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/gi.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/tl.jpg[/img]

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I’m being quite lenient with this since after looking at the wikipedia article, I can see you can do quite a lot more with the language than I initially thought.
It’s not like visual basic requires any more programming knowledge than this and I see a lot of visual basic programs in this section (which I have to admit, I do not like).

@OP
I’m being rather kind and wont remove the 2 topics now, but I wouldn’t like any more posted. I thought you came here to learn some java; why not start now?

Read full topic

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:2, topic:381209"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=476974.msg3489766#msg3489766 date=1296861342]

Game Maker Language (GML) is a scripting language

en.wikipedia.org

GameMaker Studio

GameMaker Studio (formerly Animo until 1999, Game Maker until 2011, GameMaker until 2012, and GameMaker: Studio until 2017) is a cross-platform game engine developed by YoYo Games. GameMaker accommodates the creation of cross-platform and multi-genre video games using a custom drag-and-drop visual programming language or a scripting language known as Game Maker Language, which can be used to develop more advanced games that could not be created just by using the drag and drop features. GameMaker ...


[/quote]

Not a real language.[/quote]

If it is turing-complete, which I guess GML is from a quick glance over the Wikipedia article, it is a real programming language…

Read full topic

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

and this?

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //This controls the waves of enemies in each level(doesnt start til level 5) // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// if global.wave>0 { if not instance_exists(o_enemy_spawner) && not instance_exists(o_enemy_parent) && not instance_exists(o_boss1)//make sure these dont exist { if instance_number(o_enemy_parent)<=global.wave_left//make sure there are no enemies left in the wave { if global.wave_time>0//wave timer countdown {global.wave_time-=1;} else { global.wave_time=global.wave_time_max;//reset countdown timer global.wave+=1;//increase the wave number if boss_wave>0 boss_wave-=1; else { instance_create(room_width/2,100,o_boss_spawner); } repeat(4)//just adds 4 spawners in the room so enemies come from four directions instance_create(room_width+100,room_height+100,o_enemy_spawner);//create the enemies 100 pixels away from outside the room } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“GML Programmer, post:7, topic:381159”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=476974.msg3489555#msg3489555 date=1296850615]
Not programming…
[/quote]

How is it not? I hate how people think that GML isnt a programming language. do you want to see some of the code I put in for this game?

(and this is only pary of it)
This code is for using different weapons in the game, getting ammo, reloading, and powerups

[code]global.money=0;
global.weapon=‘pistol’;
global.cur_weap=0;
global.shoot_timer_max=7;
global.reload_time=room_speed;
global.max_weapons=0;

global.hp=100;
global.maxhp=100;
global.scores=0;
text=’’;
global.reloading=0;

//glock
global.ammo[0]=15;
global.ammo_max[0]=15;
global.clip[0]=15;
global.recoil[0]=1;
//shotgun
global.ammo[1]=5;
global.ammo_max[1]=5;
global.clip[1]=10;
global.recoil[1]=4;
//uzi(smg)
global.ammo[2]=40;
global.ammo_max[2]=40;
global.clip[2]=80;
global.recoil[2]=2;
//ak47
global.ammo[3]=36;
global.ammo_max[3]=36;
global.clip[3]=72;
global.recoil[3]=3;
//RPG(rocket propelled grenade)
global.ammo[4]=1;
global.ammo_max[4]=1;
global.clip[4]=4;
global.recoil[4]=5;
global.ammo[5]=4;
global.ammo_max[5]=4;
global.clip[5]=8;
global.recoil[5]=5;[/code][/quote]

Setting variables…must be a hard task…

Read full topic

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Not programming…

How is it not? I hate how people think that GML isnt a programming language. do you want to see some of the code I put in for this game?

(and this is only pary of it)

global.money=0;global.weapon='pistol';global.cur_weap=0;global.shoot_timer_max=7;global.reload_time=room_speed;global.max_weapons=0;global.hp=100;global.maxhp=100;global.scores=0;text='';global.reloading=0;//glockglobal.ammo[0]=15;global.ammo_max[0]=15;global.clip[0]=15;global.recoil[0]=1;//shotgunglobal.ammo[1]=5;global.ammo_max[1]=5;global.clip[1]=10;global.recoil[1]=4;//uzi(smg)global.ammo[2]=40;global.ammo_max[2]=40;global.clip[2]=80;global.recoil[2]=2;//ak47global.ammo[3]=36;global.ammo_max[3]=36;global.clip[3]=72;global.recoil[3]=3;//RPG(rocket propelled grenade)global.ammo[4]=1;global.ammo_max[4]=1;global.clip[4]=4;global.recoil[4]=5;global.ammo[5]=4;global.ammo_max[5]=4;global.clip[5]=8;global.recoil[5]=5;

Read full topic

item.title: My Breakout Game In Development
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

yeah its game maker. I took it a class on it in high school and have been hooked on it ever since lol. I love making games with it. I don’t Like using the D&D anymore though. I strictly do the GML Programming Language now because there is so much more you can do with it. I even made my own browser once lol

Read full topic
